alert.note: Alert for Delaware (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 2:03PM CST until January 08 at 9:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Freezing drizzle. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Delaware County. * WHEN...Until 9 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 for Iowa, or by visiting 511ia.org, modot.org, or idot.Illinois.gov.
